name: Patagonia Queen

reviews.text: Good location and very comfortable rooms make this new hotel the right choice to a pleasant stay. The room is spacious, very clean and has a jacuzzi if you want to relax. Patagonia Queen is a small hotel and this is the reason that brings such quality to it.
reviews.title: Perfect Hotel

reviews.text: It is a perfect place to stay when visiting El Calafate, specially because of the staff. Raphael was always helpful and extremely friendly, as everyone of Patagonia Queen.
reviews.title: Do NOT take them up on their offer to send a car - it's a rip-off!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: We loved the Patagonia Queen

likes.disliked: — Slow internet and did not have wifi

reviews.text: This hotel was the farthest from the downtown restaurants and shops than any other hotel for those who don't rent a car.
reviews.title: One of a kind: beautiful

likes.liked: — Everything was done with impeccable taste..it was immaculate!
likes.disliked: — Honestly, I can't think of anything. I would come back again

reviews.title: Location, friendliness, value for money
reviews.text: this is an excellent hotel in an excellent location. You can walk to center of town, restaurants and shops in 10 minutes or less. Perfectly safe at all times to go and come.

reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
reviews.text: Staff is very friendly and will go out of its way to help. Knowlegable too.

reviews.title: Staff at reception make this place excellent
reviews.text: Room is confortable and cleand and perferctly mantained.

reviews.title: Great Hotel! We loved it!
reviews.text: Only minus is lack of food other than breakfast.

reviews.title: very nice hotel with frindly people.
reviews.text: The Patagonia Queen was clean and comfortable and a wonderful place to stay. Staff were extremely polite, friendly and very very helpful. They made our stay and planning our activities so easy. Raphael is a friendly and helpful owner, who took the time to speak to guests to ensure they were happy with their stay.

description: Capacity: 20 rooms in total. 16 double Lux rooms, 4 double Queen rooms (modifiable bedding double or triple).Location: Downtown Services: Rooms with fine wood and porphyry Patagonia stone finishes, Patagonia Queen gives a feeling of comfort and warmth. All rooms are "non-smoking", and have heating, cable TV, Telephone, minibar, electronic safe, and a private bathroom equipped with a Jacuzzi.Services included: buffet breakfast, Internet/Wi-Fi, gym, game room (pool, table tennis and board games) and a reading corner.Additional services: massages, laundry service and wine Bar
